Disneyland Resort California - Family Escapes - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Disneyland Resort California - Family Escapes Discover the dynamic city of Anaheim, nestled in sunny Southern California. Immerse yourself in the magic of Disneyland Resort, where dreams come true amidst enchanting castles, thrilling rides, and beloved characters. Dive into Anaheim's rich cultural scene at the Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center, showcasing captivating exhibitions and immersive art experiences. With its perfect blend of entertainment, culture, and delightful weather, Anaheim invites you to embark on an extraordinary journey that will leave you with memories to cherish. Deal Details Travel Dates 1 May 2026 - 30 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Dec 1, 2025 Priced From $939 Enquire Now Discover the dynamic city of Anaheim, nestled in sunny Southern California. Immerse yourself in the magic of Disneyland Resort, where dreams come true amidst enchanting castles, thrilling rides, and beloved characters. Dive into Anaheim's rich cultural scene at the Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center, showcasing captivating exhibitions and immersive art experiences. With its perfect blend of entertainment, culture, and delightful weather, Anaheim invites you to embark on an extraordinary journey that will leave you with memories to cherish. Accommodation Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance + 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass (4 stars) Experience the magic of Disneyland at Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park. Enjoy modern rooms, an outdoor pool, on-site dining, and exceptional service for a memorable stay near the enchantment of Disneyland Resort. 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass - A Disneyland Resort Multi-Day Park Hopper Ticket, with applicable park reservation, is valid for admission to both Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park over a specified number of days, including visits to both Theme Parks on the same day with Lightning Lane Multi Pass. Rooms Standard Room - Queen Bed with Bunk Bed (5 nights) 01 May - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,879.00 Includes: 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass Note: Airfares & transfers are additional. Features 5 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, family share (based on 2 adults & 2 children) Airfares and transfers are additional Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn, Anaheim + 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket (3 stars) The Best Western Plus Stovall’s Inn boasts a prime location right next to Disneyland®, and is the perfect choice for families. Relax in the cosy and spacious rooms and be sure to unwind at the two heated outdoor pools and spas. 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket - Enjoy three full days exploring Disneyland Park OR Disney California Adventure Park on each day of your ticket. Discover the excitement of the Disneyland Resort in Anaheim, California, featuring two amazing theme parks—Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park! A multi-day ticket will let you make the most of your visit and see what both parks have to offer. Rooms High Room 2 Queen Beds (5 nights) 01 May - 10 Jun 26 Stay price: $939.00 Includes: Breakfast daily & 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket Note: Airfares & transfers are additional. Features 5 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, family share (based on 2 adults & 2 children) Airfares and transfers are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 04 November 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 04 November 2025 until 01 December 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & transfers are additional. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Product is based on 2 adults & 2 children (3-9 years) using existing bedding. Disneyland Resort California: Tickets purchased under the AU/NZ Residents Offer require guests to present valid Government-Issued Photo Identification from Australia or New Zealand upon entry to the Park. Guests who are unable to present appropriate ID will not be granted entry. Disney Tickets T&C's Child rates apply for 3-9 years. To enter a park on a particular day, both a park reservation for that day and a Ticket valid for park admission on that day are required for Guests (ages 3 and older). Refer to your e-ticket for details on how to book your park reservation. The guest should check park availability by visiting disneytraveltradeinfo.com/dlrcalendar (or such other URL as communicated by Disney to the Travel Distributor) prior to purchase. Theme parks will be limited in capacity, and park reservations are limited in number and subject to the availability of park reservations allocated to park tickets as determined by Disney, and theme park capacity, and are not guaranteed. It is recommended that guest make their theme park reservation immediately after purchasing their Ticket. Guests with a valid Ticket should visit StartYourDisneylandExperience.com to make theme park reservations. The ticket must be linked to a Disney account, and online registration is required. Park reservation availability can change until the park reservation is confirmed. To accommodate as many types of ticket holders as possible, park reservations for select dates may be made available on a rolling basis. Guests should check for updated availability. Tickets and park reservations are subject to applicable state guidance and other requirements imposed by health authorities and appropriate government agencies. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs. Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to. Booking and/or service fees apply. For full terms & conditions visit https://travelmanagers.co.nz/terms Experience the world differently.
